name: Dr.Mohan K
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: B.Sc  ( Physics )  - Govt. Arts College, Coimbatore   - 1998M.C.A  - Govt. Arts College, Coimbatore   - 2001Ph.D  ( Computer Science )  - Anna University  - 10/03/2016Supervisor: Dr. C. Kalaiarasan
in_brief: A career spanning total of 16 years experiences in the software industry and in the teaching field, Over 12+ years of experience in the field of teaching and experts in the subject taught to the students and also having 3+ years of experience in the software industry as Software Engineer and expert in the Microsoft and Java Technologies. He is a motivating and talented computer science faculty driven to inspire students to pursue academic, research and personal excellence. Consistently strive to create a challenging and engaging learning environment in which students become life-long scholars and learners.
research_areas: Service Oriented Architecture and Web Services

publications.journal: The International Journal of Printing, Packaging, & Allied Sciences
publications.title: Optimized QoS aware Web Service Selection Model Using Hybrid Genetic Algorithm and Improved Particle Swarm Optimization Algorithm
Triggering Service Selection Mechanism with Genetic inspired Ant – Colony Optimization
An Improved Fuzzy Guided Genetic Algorithm for the Selection of Web Services

publications.journal: Australian Journal of Basic and Applied Sciences
publications.title: A Hybrid Optimization Algorithm combining Genetic Algorithm with Neural Network for Web Service Selection

publications.journal: ARPN Journal of Engineering and Applied Sciences
publications.title: A Survey on Applications of Evolutionary Techniques in Web Service Selection
